name: Fidra
goal: Fidra identifies issues of environmental concern and establishes current activity, public perception and knowledge, conducts scientific literature review and best practice to establish how we can best influence positive environmental change. Projects are undertaken where there is a clear role for us, where there is an evidence base supporting the need for change and, as a solutions focused organisation, where clear outcomes and the steps required to reach these have been identified. Fidra is located in East Lothian, Scotland. Projects are primarily identified locally but will also have national and international significance.
euInitiatives: Consultation: "Investigating options for reducing releases in the aquatic environment of microplastics emitted by (but not intentionally added in) products" as part of the overall strategy on plastics.
